nsp

Interface MosaicWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MosaicWriter_Raster

    public interface MosaicWriter
    Generic interface for reading over Moaic objects and persisting them to output.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFolder(java.lang.String path)
      Sets the path of the output file.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of the output file.
      void setWriteHeader(boolean writeHeader)
      Sets whether the ESRI ASCII header should be added to the file or not.
      void write(Mosaic mosaic)
      Writes the contents of the RasterMosaic to an ESRI format ASCII file using RasterWriter

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of the output file. The path is set separately by setPath

      • setFolder

        void setFolder(java.lang.String path)
        Sets the path of the output file. The name of the file is set separately by setName

      • write

        void write(Mosaic mosaic)
        Writes the contents of the RasterMosaic to an ESRI format ASCII file using RasterWriter

      • setWriteHeader

        void setWriteHeader(boolean writeHeader)
        Sets whether the ESRI ASCII header should be added to the file or not. Having a header is useful for viewing in GIS. No header is useful if importing files into R or Matlab.
